response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to own our premium product. Given its value and significance, I believe it's worth every penny of the $12,000 it represents to you. However, to make this offer more appealing, I am willing to extend a special deal. Let me know your thoughts, and we can proceed accordingly.", "product_price": 11000}
